summary: 该插件用于检测DotNetNuke系统中的ImageHandler SSRF（CVE-2017-0929）漏洞，通过构造特定的URL请求，验证是否存在服务器端请求伪造问题。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the ImageHandler SSRF (CVE-2017-0929) vulnerability in the DotNetNuke system. It constructs specific URL requests to verify whether there is a server-side request forgery issue.
